descriptionHtml:
[b][size=6]                          [/size][color=#cccccc]  [/color][color=#9900ff] [/color] [color=#00ff00] [i][u][font=Times New Roman] [/font][font=Arial][size=6]Millennium [/size][size=6]EN[/size][/font][/u][/i][/color][/b][b][font=Arial][i][u][size=6][color=#00ff00]B[/color][color=#000000] [/color][/size][color=#000000][size=2]by  Johnny12343
[/size][/color][/u][/i][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#ff0000]TURN UP YOUR IN GAME BRIGHTNESS...

[/color][color=#00ffff]Requirements:                                                                                                         Recommended:                                                        
   Elfx                                                                                                                          Realistic Water 2
   Natural Lighting and Atmospherics for Enb                                                             Water Color for Enb
   Enb V.279                                                                                                                Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/color]

     
[img]http://s9.postimg.org/v0bgunpdb/2015_09_01_00028.jpg[/img][/font][/b][b][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[/font][/b]-Rustic

[img]http://s28.postimg.org/40hucnsjh/2015_09_27_00010.jpg[/img]
- Mystic
[color=#00ffff]Check Out the new MYSTIC edition featured above ^. Much better lighting and sky lighting edits. This is very vibrant and colorful compared to the other two. .. Depth of Field and AO will naturally be set to off to demonstrate possible performance vs looks. If you want it on press shift+ enter in game and simply check the boxes for the effects.[/color]
[img]http://s24.postimg.org/u7ugpqjph/2015_09_06_00017.jpg[/img]

-Gemini


////Aesthetically Beautiful ENB that Intelligently provides Realistic Rustic Scenes With Eloquent Vibrance without being too colorful or over done.See Skyrim in a new Style. Millennium Runs on v0279 ENB however it is Very Performance Friendly using Hand selected settings and specialized DOF. This ENB had been requested by many people so i thought i would share it. Please follow instructions in order to get similar results and good fps. 

You  will likely need to set  your in game brightness higher.

[color=#6aa84f]New Addition - Gemini will provide a more natural and clear look for those who desire it.[/color]
[color=#ff7700]Rustic Edition is the original aka Millienium[/color]


[img]http://s9.postimg.org/jf1amy3vz/2015_09_06_00010.jpg[/img]
-Gemini


[img]http://s9.postimg.org/7sh6ltgkv/2015_09_05_00004.jpg[/img]
 -Rustic



[img]http://s9.postimg.org/krizou1bj/2015_09_03_00004.jpg[/img]
-Rustic

Requirements: [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0279.htm]Enb v0279(just enbhost.exe and d3dll files)
[/url]                     
                      

Installation:   Once all the previous requirements have been met simply drag and drop the main files into your skyrim directory.

                     Make sure you shut off Anti-aliasing and Anisotropic filtering in skyrim launcher options
                 
                     Then go to your documents/games/skyrim/skyrim.ini and insure that these lines are set-
                      bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
                      
                       bShadowsOnGrass=1

                     Enb ini is set to automatically configure your graphics card specs however on some rigs this does not work normally, Adjust to your proper                           videomemorysize if this happens

                    Adjust your monitor, I keep my screen backlight all the way up and Vibrance(color) just a little turned up
                    
                    Once In game adjust your brightness through startmenu. Mine is fairly high as the enb can make the game a little dark.

                    Shift+Enter to open enb effects. Tinker around if you want to personalize your game even further.

Recommendations:  For FPS seekers i would leave Ambient Occlusion Off for this one, Its performance vs price ratio is hardly worth it. However if you have                                a high end machine knock your socks off.
                               
                              [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58818/?]HD LODs that will blend better with enb. Dark and grassy[/url] This will make your landscape views look far nicer 

                            
                                I wont include links but i use young males for mens skin texture and Fair complexion for womens.
 
                               For anything else please simply post and i will reply.

     Best of Luck and may Talos bless you all
